headline: Pilot Study Showcases the Value of Portrait Mobile Continuous Monitoring Solution to Encourage Clinical Intervention While Mitigating Alarm Fatigue
summary: CHICAGO, November 18, 2024--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today announced the publication of data from a two-phase pilot study conducted with Cleveland Clinic in the peer-reviewed Journal of Clinical Anesthesia, highlighting performance of the wireless and wearable Portrait™ Mobile monitoring solution in the post-surgical ward environment.
